Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two people holding something that might resemble cups (there is a general attempt to depict the concept).
Show a line connecting the two people (attempt to show connection but likely doesn't illustrate function).
CANNOT: Illustrate the use of sound traveling through the string (no depiction or understanding of sound waves).
Label parts of the string telephone correctly, such as cups and string (likely unlabeled or incorrectly labeled).
Describe or caption how the string carries sound (lacking explanation or made up reasoning, e.g., *'magic words'*).
Explain how the materials (cups and string) work together to transmit sound (misunderstands purpose or thinks string is just for holding the cups together).
Reflect or write about how the string telephone functions effectively (no explanation or understanding of sound waves or vibration).
